dialogs.responseText: How'd you get past my barricade? I'm supposed to be the only one here!
You WHAT!? It took me ages to make that! Now I gotta do it all over again... What do you want here anyways? The library is empty.

You don't know? This is the castle of Nid, the wizard. He died a long time ago, and none of his descendents were willing to replace him. We in the city formed a parpolity of sorts and things have been swell ever since. I came here to get away from it all, though. As you can see, there's nothing for you here. Please leave.
What? I don't have anything to give... Well, I suppose you can have this book. It was the only one I found in here, but there's almost nothing written in it. Seems pretty useless to me.
